metadata.title: ColiBlanco.ai | Your Data, Your Power
metadata.description: Take control of your data. ColiBlanco.ai empowers you to own, manage, and monetize your personal data while maintaining complete privacy and security.

meta.title: ColiBlanco.ai | Your Data, Your Power - Take Control of Your Digital Life
meta.description: Experience a new era of data ownership where you're in control. Own your data, protect your privacy, and get rewarded for your attention.

hero.title: Born in Europe, Designed for Freedom
hero.subtitle: We live in a connected world — vibrant, fast-paced, and full of potential. But somewhere along the way, control over our data slipped from our hands. Big Tech took the driver's seat. And we? We became the product. It's time to change that.
hero.description: Meet ColiBlanco — born in Europe, designed for freedom, and powered by trust. One simple tap connects you to your own intelligent assistant. It's not just tech. It's your tech. Built for your world.

features.title: Features

workflow.title: Fly Free Like a Hummingbird
workflow.description: ColiBlanco gives you the freedom to live as you wish, without worrying about your digital privacy. Just like a hummingbird, you'll effortlessly navigate the digital landscape.

collaboration.title: Enjoy Every Digital Experience
collaboration.description: With ColiBlanco, you can enjoy the internet without worries. Your digital nectar is no longer stolen by big corporations but comes directly to you.

security.title: Protected by the Nature of Technology
security.description: Just as the hummingbird is fast and agile, our technology protects you against digital predators that are after your valuable data.

features.mainTitle: Fly Free in the Digital Landscape
features.subtitle: ColiBlanco gives you wings to escape the digital cages that big tech companies have built for you. And the best part? You get rewarded for it too!

mainCta.title: Ready to spread your wings?
mainCta.subtitle: Discover how ColiPhone can transform your digital life

main.title: Your Digital Nectar, Only for You
main.description: Just as a hummingbird collects nectar, you collect valuable digital experiences. But unlike the current internet, this nectar remains yours and yours alone.

community.title: Harvest the Fruits of Your Digital Garden
community.description: Every click, every search, every interaction online is valuable. With ColiBlanco, you finally reap the rewards of your own digital garden.

blockchain.title: You Are the Conductor of Your Digital Orchestra
blockchain.description: Decide for yourself what music plays in your digital life. With one movement, you change the melody or stop the concert altogether.

device.title: ColiPhone: Your Digital Wings
device.description: A revolutionary device that gives you the freedom to fly in the digital world, without worrying about who's spying on you or stealing your data.

privacy.title: Privacy-First Design
privacy.description: Built with privacy as the foundation, not as an extra feature. Your data remains yours.

cloud.title: Cloud-Based System
cloud.description: All functionality comes from the cloud, keeping the device affordable and always up-to-date.

calling.title: One Communication Platform
calling.description: Forget email, WhatsApp, and SMS. ColiPhone integrates all communication into one intuitive platform.

independence.title: Independence Guaranteed
independence.description: No dependence on big American tech companies. You decide who has access to your digital life.

card.title: ColiCard
card.description: The technical core of the ColiPhone ecosystem. An advanced card that securely stores your digital identity.

users.title: For Users
users.description: Take control of your data and earn from it

investors.title: For Investors
investors.description: Invest in the future of data

influencers.title: Influencers
influencers.description: Increase your reach and earn more with your content while maintaining your privacy.

powerful.title: A New Era of Digital Control
powerful.description: At ColiBlanco.ai, we believe your data should work for you. Wherever you go, whichever device you use, your digital life follows—secure, private, and in your control.
powerful.description2: Our AI assistant learns from you to assist you, without sending your habits or preferences to anyone else. Every insight it gains belongs to you.

secure.title: Secure & Private
secure.description: Your digital life follows—secure and in your control

rewards.title: Earn Rewards
rewards.description: Get paid for the ads you choose to see

validation.title: Ethical by Design
validation.description: Our open-source community ensures innovation thrives, and only partners who sign and follow our 'Matter of Principle' are allowed to integrate with us.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.subtitle: Your Data, Your Control
privacy.description: Complete control over your personal information and digital footprint.

ai.title: Smart Assistant
ai.subtitle: AI That Works For You
ai.description: Personalized assistance without compromising your privacy.

rewards.title: Get Rewarded
rewards.subtitle: Your Attention, Your Value
rewards.description: Choose your ads and get paid for your engagement.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated
newsletter.subtitle: Subscribe for updates
newsletter.description: Join our waitlist to receive updates about ColiBlanco.ai
newsletter.error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

contact.name: Your name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

footer.description: ColiBlanco is more than an assistant. It's a movement. Born in Europe, designed for freedom, and governed by an independent foundation. Your AI. Your data. Your rules.

contact.title: Contact
contact.name: Name
contact.success: Thank you for your message! We'll be in touch soon.
contact.error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

customer.title: Take Back Control
customer.subtitle: We live in a connected world — vibrant, fast-paced, and full of potential. But somewhere along the way, control over our data slipped from our hands. Big Tech took the driver's seat. And we? We became the product. It's time to change that.

privacy.title: Your AI, Your Data
privacy.description: Unlike Big Tech, ColiBlanco is governed by an independent foundation. We don't just promise ethics — we're audited for it.

earnings.title: Earn With Your Data
earnings.description: Want to earn from your data? Only if you choose. With ColiBlanco, you can share your interests and get rewarded — transparently and fairly.

freedom.title: Portable Identity
freedom.description: Wherever you go — to work, to your living room, or on the road — ColiBlanco follows. One card, one experience that adapts to you.

control.title: Smart Contexts
control.description: Your life has many sides. ColiBlanco understands that. It keeps your private and work worlds separate, intelligently switching modes.

company.title: Empower your business with data
company.subtitle: Improve your business processes with secure and ethical data solutions

insights.title: Valuable Data Insights
insights.description: Get direct access to fair, transparent data from users who consciously choose to share.

impact.title: Direct Impact
impact.description: Be part of a revolution in data management. Help build a fairer internet for everyone.

model.title: Fair Revenue Model
model.description: Only pay for the data you use. Direct, transparent, and without intermediaries.

compliance.title: Privacy & Compliance
compliance.description: Fully GDPR-compliant. All data exchange is transparent and traceable via blockchain.

investor.title: Invest in the Future
investor.subtitle: Become part of the data revolution

growth.title: Exponential Growth
growth.description: Invest in a platform shaping the future of data exchange. Benefit from early adoption and network effects.

security.title: Secure Investment
security.description: Blockchain-based tokens and smart contracts ensure transparency and security of your investment.

impact.title: Global Impact
impact.description: Help build a fairer internet. Be part of a worldwide movement for data democratization.

market.title: Market Share
market.description: Get early access to a growing market for personal data. Position yourself in this emerging industry.

opensource.title: Open Source
opensource.description: Contribute to a fully open source platform. Help build the future of the internet.

tech.title: Cutting-Edge Tech
tech.description: Work with the latest technologies: blockchain, AI, and decentralized systems.

community.title: Active Community
community.description: Join a vibrant community of developers building a better digital world.

rewards.title: Rewards & Recognition
rewards.description: Receive rewards for your contributions. Build a reputation in the Web3 community.

influencer.title: Make Impact with Your Content
influencer.subtitle: Reach more people, earn more from your content, and maintain full control over your data
influencer.description: Reach more people, earn more from your content, and maintain full control over your data. With ColiBlanco.ai, you get the tools to expand your reach while ensuring your privacy remains protected.

reach.title: Expand Your Reach
reach.description: Reach a wider audience with our advanced targeting and recommendation algorithms.

earnings.title: Maximize Your Earnings
earnings.description: Earn directly from your content and receive fair compensation for your influence.

analytics.title: In-Depth Analytics
analytics.description: Get detailed insights into your performance and follower behavior.

community.title: Build Your Community
community.description: Create a strong and engaged community around your brand and values.
